job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: Blue Rose is currently seeking someone with the skills to help us improve the public-facing systems of a federal client. Specifically, you will implement a new chatbot product to enhance customer experience and reduce operational costs by using conversational AI technology - natural language processing (NLP) and other cognitive APIs. You will develop, train, and evaluate natural language processing (NLP) models for the deployed Conversational AI Platform.The successful candidate will:use statistical analysis and programming to analyze and interpret language datasets provide expertise in AI services, including Natural Language Processing, and ML architectureanalyze training and test data to help fine tune semantic models to improve overall accuracy and performancedevelop supervised and unsupervised learning models to provide actionable insights for business requirements.Requirements:Must be U.S. CitizenExperienced in Machine Learning concepts and algorithms, Python (3.X), Scikit-Learn, Natural Language Tool Kit, and SQL (Relational or NoSQL)Preferred experience with backend web development (Java, Mongo/DynamoDB, NodeJS) and RESTful ArchitectureThe salary for this position is $110,000 - $130,000 annually.Powered by JazzHRQNXetDeDtQ
